summary: Female companion combat nightingale with mercer fay melee combat style
descriptionHtml:
Female companion\\ follower that lvls as a combat nightingale with mercer fay melee combat style.  Cindy should be placed at Jorrvaskr in Whiterun. Big sister to nightingale Faye http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19029/. Both NPCs should be marriageable as well as being followers.

Mods used during creation:
	
Skyrim NPC Editor 0_75_1 - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4554	
Better Females by Bella - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812
Pretty Face - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7887	
Enhanced Character Edit - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951	
ApachiiSkyHair - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168	
Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666 


Armors used in the images are;
	
R18Pn 02 - Leere Armor for UNP and CBBE V3 - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11756
Remodeled Armor CBBEv3M - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13004 

Mesh 00010001.nif and Texture 00010001.dds are included in the rar file and should be placed in the BBLS_Cindy.esp folder in the texture and meshes path.
author: Zexiv
